subject: Redirection Old Site to TFC Podiatry
preview: Hi Heath,  I'll enquire with the site owner about their availability on Monday and get back to you.  Thank you!

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

I'll enquire with the site owner about their availability on Monday and get back to you.

Thank you!

Thanks Kristel, 

They have 2 factor auth running on the account. Will the client be available on Monday afternoon to send us the auth code? 

Reference screen shot attached.

Hi Heath,

We were successful in obtaining DNS access. Hopefully, we'll be able to update the redirects now that we have access to GoDaddy.

For more information, please see the attached files.

Thank you very much!

Hi Health,

We'd get in touch with the site's owner and ask if they could try to gain DNS access.

Thank you very much for your help!

Hi Kristel, 

Yes that's as good as we can get it as the domain is still hosting in WIX. 

If they can get access to their domain, I can do a more complete solution, but based on the limited access, this is the best I can achieve I'm afraid.

Hi Heath,

My apologies, there are some additional items that I just found.

When you visit https://www.podcopodiatry.com/blog/, you are not redirected to https://www.tfcpodiatry.com.au/blog/; somewhat, the URL remains unchanged, with only the content changing.

Also, I just wanted to confirm if these URLs https://d.pr/ecrWrN couldn't be set to 410, resulting in the page being set to 404 and only the content changing.

I just wanted to know how the redirection was set up so we could provide more information to the site owner.

Thank you very much!

Hi Kristel, 

We have now updated these redirects. Please let me know if you need anything else?

Hi Health,

The URL for the Avondale Location page was changed from https://www.tfcpodiatry.com.au/locations/avondale-heights-podiatry to https://www.tfcpodiatry.com.au/locations/podiatrist-avondale-heights/

We've highlighted the URL redirections that need to be updated here

Thank you so much!

Hi Heath,

We actually ask the site owner to contact Godaddy in order to retrieve their access.

I just wanted to know if you had redirected the Podco Podiatry home page to the TFC home page and if you had done the same for the other pages. (via Wix)

Yes, that is most likely the case, as we don't have the Godadyy access.

If the owner is able to regain access to their GoDaddy account, does this mean we could go back to the original redirection plan (via DNS) and they don't have to keep their Wix account?

Thanks a lot!

Hi Kristel, 

We have managed to do the redirect without access to GoDaddy. 

This does however mean that the client needs to keep their WIX account active for the redirect to work.

Hi Heath,

My apologies for the delay here. Unfortunately, the website's owner does not currently have the access that we need.
Is there any way to do the redirection without having DNS access to GoDaddy?

Thank you!

Hi Kristel, 

It's access to the DNS not website host. We need to point that domain name to the TFC server in order to do the redirections. I think it's with GoDaddy from what I can see.

Hi Health,

Yes, we could try to obtain the logins. Do you wish to have access to their website host?

I just wanted to know what kind of login access you need.

Thank you!

Hi Kristel, 

Thanks for this. These logins are for the WIX website, but I believe we need the GoDaddy logins. Do you have those?

Hi Heath,

Yes, we do. Please see the details below.
-------

PodCo Wix Website

Login
https://users.wix.com/signin?forceRender=true

Username
rachael@podcopodiatry.com

Password
Podcois#1

------

Thank you!

Hi Kristel, 

We will need access to the podcopodiatry.com domain name to add these redirects. Do you have those handy?
@heath I don't think we have access to https://www.podcopodiatry.com/ and can I hack into https://www.tfcpodiatry.com.au/ to add us as a user?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig
Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
@rica @joel, I redirect some pages but some are not updated specially for the response code that has 410. I don't know if the procedures are the same with the 301 (using the redirection plugin).

here is the excel file https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1abjf5J6rRIsIiQxkxciv7apWIrdwDU10Y3uLQ-AdXaQ/edit#gid=292591888

task done 10mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli
